    • Uses of AlgebraicLine in imagingbook.pub.geometry.lines

      Subclasses of AlgebraicLine in imagingbook.pub.geometry.lines 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  HessianLine
      This class represents a straight line in Hessian normal form, i.e., x * cos(angle) + y * sin(angle) = radius.
      Methods in imagingbook.pub.geometry.lines that return AlgebraicLine 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static AlgebraicLine AlgebraicLine.fromPoints​(Pnt2d p1, Pnt2d p2)  
      Methods in imagingbook.pub.geometry.lines with parameters of type AlgebraicLine 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void Utils.draw​(AlgebraicLine line, ij.process.ImageProcessor ip, double thickness)
      This is a brute-force drawing method which simply marks all image pixels that are sufficiently close to the HoughLine hl.

      This class represents a straight line used by the Hough transform (see HoughTransformLines).
